code2design.title: Code to Design
code2design.upload_tips: Click to upload code file or drag and drop
code2design.prompt:
1. Based on the image, encapsulate components as much as possible; 2. Use blob links for my images 3. 1:1 restoration of this image, you need to refer to margins, sizes, fonts and backgrounds in this JSON array! The generated CSS color must be exactly the same as the JSON color 4. Use ts. 5. There may be repeated places in the image, try to use components, without breaking the original style, try to reuse as much as possible. 6. All text types need to use text overflow styles, pay attention to identifying whether it is single-line or multi-line text, overflow with '...' truncation, to ensure page beauty when text length changes; 7. Use
and other tags, don't use

and other tags 8. Also help me change the CSS names, many CSS are too complex, can be simplified, try to use flex layout as much as possible, in some cases you don't necessarily have to use absolute. 9. The hierarchy may not be right, so you need to fix it 10. Refer to the data for top, bottom, left and right spacing and try to restore it as much as possible. Finally emphasize! Don't omit the code!!!!

prompts.base: Please generate based on the uploaded design
prompts.react: React code, using TypeScript, styles using Tailwind CSS, the project should have a startup entry, and ensure the project can run, and ensure the code meets best practices and performance optimization.
prompts.vue: Vue3 code, using TypeScript and Composition API, styles using Tailwind CSS, and ensure the code meets Vue's best practices.
prompts.miniprogram: Mini Program code, using native mini program framework, styles using WXSS, ensure compliance with mini program development specifications and best practices. Use rpx units to write this interface, if there is a status bar on the design, please remove it, pay attention to styles and width when writing mini programs

weapi.delete_api_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this API?
weapi.delete_folder_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this folder and all its contents?
